body:
Tried building likwid/5.1.0 on laptop running recently undated Fedora 33 from a fresh spack clone.  There were no modifications made to files within ~/.spack and build fails in same way with or without ~/.spack.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

#!/bin/bash
git clone https://github.com/spack/spack.git
source spack/share/spack/setup-env.sh
spack install -j 4 likwid@5.1.0

### Error Message

==> Installing likwid-5.1.0-2znqh4hqbqyiowi2dckmwkottm327eyc
==> No binary for likwid-5.1.0-2znqh4hqbqyiowi2dckmwkottm327eyc found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/5a/5a180702a1656c6315b861a85031ab4cb090424aec42cbbb326b849e29f55571.tar.gz
####################################################################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> likwid: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4'

1 error found in build log:
     100    ===>  COMPILE  GCC/topology_hwloc.o
     101    ===>  COMPILE  GCC/topology_proc.o
     102    ===>  COMPILE  GCC/tree.o
     103    ===>  COMPILE  GCC/voltage.o
     104    ===>  COMPILE  GCC/loadData.o
     105    ===>  ENTER  /tmp/wdn/spack-stage/spack-stage-likwid-5.1.0-2znqh4hqbqyiowi2dckmwkottm327eyc/spack-src/ext/hwloc
  >> 106    make: make: Permission denied
     107    make: *** [Makefile:268: /tmp/wdn/spack-stage/spack-stage-likwid-5.1.0-2znqh4hqbqyiowi2dckmwkottm327eyc/spack-src/ext/hwloc/liblikwid-hwloc.so] Error 127

See build log for details:
  /tmp/wdn/spack-stage/spack-stage-likwid-5.1.0-2znqh4hqbqyiowi2dckmwkottm327eyc/spack-build-out.txt

Here are contents of directory mentioned above.

% ll /tmp/wdn/spack-stage/spack-stage-likwid-5.1.0-2znqh4hqbqyiowi2dckmwkottm327eyc/spack-src/ext/hwloc
total 12
drwxr-x---. 4 wdn wdn  140 Nov 20 08:37 ./
drwxr-x---. 5 wdn wdn  100 Nov 20 08:37 ../
-rw-r-----. 1 wdn wdn  339 Nov 20 08:37 AUTHORS
-rw-r-----. 1 wdn wdn 2552 Nov 20 08:37 COPYING
drwxr-x---. 2 wdn wdn  420 Nov 20 08:37 hwloc/
drwxr-x---. 4 wdn wdn  120 Nov 20 08:37 include/
-rw-r-----. 1 wdn wdn 2241 Nov 20 08:37 Makefile

Looks like liblikwid-hwloc.so is not present.  Not sure why.

### Information on your system

% spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-444-22a45e010
* **Python:** 3.9.1
* **Platform:** linux-fedora33-haswell
* **Concretizer:** original

No special configuration details.  No modifications to ~/.spack files.

### Additional information

- [x ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output

<!-- We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively!

If you want to ask a question about the tool (how to use it, what it can currently do, etc.), try the `#general` channel on our Slack first. We have a welcoming community and chances are you'll get your reply faster and without opening an issue.

Other than that, thanks for taking the time to contribute to Spack! -->
title: Build of likwid fails on Fedora 33 when using spack develop branch
